attributes.action: Legalise the personal use of cannabis
attributes.additional_details:
The largest study yet of genes and predisposition to schizophrenia and cannabis use looked at anonymised data from 180,000 people and found that the correlation between Cannabis use and mental illness is due to self medication and not the cause of said Psychosis, this undermines the govenments reasons for continuing their false rhetoric.
Nature Neuroscience:https://www.nature.com/articles/s41593-018-0206-1
attributes.background: time and time again, the govenment claims that their reason for blocking the legalisation of cannabis is due to the effects of cannabis causing psychosis, recent research proves this wrong.
